author: Times Of India
title: Ensure protection to medical staff, states told
description: There have been some reports of doctors and healthcare professionals working on the frontline of the pandemic facing verbal and physical abuse by people accusing them of spreading the virus in residential localities.
content:
.@HMOIndia again requests states to give necessary police protection to doctors & medical staff at hospitals/patien https://t.co/ozewTPpwBo
— PIB India #StayHome #StaySafe (@PIB_India) 1586608471000
